title: help not authenticating
body: Hi people, my connection used to be fine, sometimes a small lagspike. So i thought id give the hextech tool a try. But after I used it i cant connect anymore. My client gets stuck on authenticating. Any help/suggestions?

replies.body: It might actually just be something like a firewall or antivirus blocking your network from reaching our login servers. Make sure to turn those off temp while playing League to see if that helps. If not go ahead and hit the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
